original: intros. unfold CV_disk. intros. apply ex_series_DAlembert with (k:= l) in H0. apply Alembert_C5 in H0 as [l' H1]; auto. apply is_lim_seq_unique in H1. unfold CV_disk. intros. apply ex_series_DAlembert with (k := 1 / l) in H. apply Alembert_C6 with (l:=l) in H. unfold not. intros H2. apply H2. split; auto. apply Rabs_pos_lt. intros H3. apply H3. split; auto.
